amendment.description: To protect Social Security benefits and military pay and require that the United States Government prioritize all obligations on the debt held by the public in the event that the debt limit is reached.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 8 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 8.
Amendment SA 8 proposed by Senator Toomey.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 8 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 8.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 8 proposed by Senator Toomey.
